definition: younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
to take the tonsure/to shave the head/tonsure (shaved head of Buddhist monk)
to shave the whole head clean/crushing defeat
the Qing order to all men to shave their heads but keep a queue, first ordered in 1646
to shave the head but keep the queue

sentences.english: He's had his beard shaved off.
The notables then went away, and on the third day they all came with shaved heads.
sentences.chinese: 宴會散了，可第三天那些名人顯貴都剃了光頭來赴宴。

sentences.english: She took a razor and shaved between my eyebrows and even shaped them.
sentences.chinese: 她還拿剃刀剃掉我眉毛的中間，甚至修出眉形。

sentences.english: The Moisturizing Shaving System is equipped with a dual blade system to give you an ultra close shave.
sentences.chinese: 剃的保溼系統，配備了雙刀片系統給你一個超近距離。

sentences.english: And he shaved an old pig.
sentences.chinese: 給他拉首開心點，他給老豬剃豬毛。

sentences.english: From his half- shaven head I could tell that he was off to receive brain surgery.
sentences.chinese: 他的頭髮半剃，可見得即將接受腦部手術。

sentences.english: B shaved head also helped her stay cool in Egypts stifling heat.
sentences.chinese: 剃禿頂發也能讓她在埃及使人梗塞的很熱衷連結風涼。

sentences.english: A few years ago this unshaven look was so popular in America. I thought it was awful.
sentences.chinese: 幾年前在美國很流行不剃鬍須，我認爲這很噁心。

sentences.english: Why don't you shave off that beard and get a haircut?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼不剃掉鬍子，理個髮呢？

sentences.english: During that time he was ordered by those criminals to shave off his beard to change his appearance.
sentences.chinese: 那時，那幫罪犯命令他把鬍子剃掉來改變他的外貌。

sentences.english: All right! You, sir, How about a shave?
sentences.chinese: 好吧，你，先生，剃一次須怎麼樣？

sentences.english: He is one of few men who look better completely bald.
sentences.chinese: 他是爲數不多剃了光頭更好看的演員。

sentences.english: Vortex gives you the sharpest blade available at 30 degrees for the ultimate in precision shaving.
sentences.chinese: 渦給你最銳利的刀片可在30度爲最終在精密剃。

sentences.english: On the base, it also put forward the suggestion to correct the convex angle size of preshaving hob cutter.
sentences.chinese: 在此基礎上，提出了剃前滾刀凸角尺寸修改的建議。

sentences.english: While patients of contol group adopted cleaning the local skin and hair removal method for operational locations one day before the operation.
sentences.chinese: 對照組採用術前一天清潔局部皮膚加術野剃毛備皮法。

sentences.english: Howbeit the hair of his head began to grow again after he was shaven.
sentences.chinese: 然而他的頭髮被剃之後，又漸漸長起來了。

definition: to shave the whole head clean/crushing defeat
scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
to cut off/to cut away/to trim
beard/mustache or whiskers/facial hair/CL:撮[zuo3],根[gen1]/(coll.) bandit
